actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Practice&Procedure.
Subcommittee on Administrative Practice&Procedure. Approved for full committee consideration without amendment favorably.
Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Thurmond without amendment. With written report No. 98-150.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 237.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Practice and Procedure

official_title: A bill to amend section 1 of the Act of June 5, 1920, as amended, to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to settle claims for damages of less than $2,500 arising by reason of acts for which the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration is responsible.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to settle claims not exceeding $2,500 for damages caused by acts of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1 of the Act of June 5, 1920, as amended, to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to settle claims for damages of less than $2,500 arising by reason of acts for which the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration is responsible.
